meanings.definition: A person or thing that adjusts.
meanings.sent1: The adjuster fixed the chair to make it more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The adjuster on the thermostat controls the temperature in the room.
meanings.sent3: The adjuster tried to fix the wobbly table but accidentally made it worse.
meanings.sent4: She was like an adjuster of emotions, always finding the right balance.
meanings.sent5: The adjuster in the clock kept everything running smoothly.

meanings.definition: A device for making small changes to something.
meanings.sent1: The camera adjuster helped improve the focus of the picture.
meanings.sent2: The volume adjuster on the TV remote allows you to control the sound.
meanings.sent3: The adjuster for the blinds got stuck halfway, creating a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an adjuster, subtly altering the course of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: With the help of the adjuster, the guitar sounded just right.
